text:
[Verse]
Stars above so bright tonight
Whispers in the midnight light
Chasing shadows on the run
Underneath the silver sun

[Verse 2]
City lights are fading fast
Dreams we thought would somehow last
Footsteps echo on the street
As our hearts begin to beat

[Chorus]
Midnight dreams just you and me
Dancing to our melody
In the silence we are free
Wishing on a starlit sea

[Verse 3]
Cold wind blowing through our hair
Magic floating in the air
Lost in moments we can't find
In the corners of our mind

[Bridge]
Moonlight guides us as we go
Through the streets we used to know
Everything feels so serene
Living in our midnight dream

[Chorus]
Midnight dreams just you and me
Dancing to our melody
In the silence we are free
Wishing on a starlit sea
title: Midnight Dreams
